riddles.prompt: In this cave, An ancient latch awaits a word. The ward yields to the friend. (an epithet, not a title)
In this excavation, A carved lid will not yield. The ward yields to the star-queen. (the older form)
In this troll hoard, An iron lock hums with magic. The ward yields to the red ring. (the elder tongue)
In this barrow, A sealed door blocks your path. Choose the white ring. (the elder tongue)
In this ruined tower, A cold glyph demands proof. Name the blue ring. (an epithet, not a title)
In this vault, A hidden cache answers only a password. Choose the flame of the west. (the hidden name)
In this bandit camp, A hidden cache answers only a password. The seal knows the broken blade. (the elder tongue)
In this orc lair, An ancient latch awaits a word. Choose the orc-warning blade. (the older form)
In this mine, A cold glyph demands proof. The seal knows the foe-hammer. (an epithet, not a title)

In this crypt, A spectral voice tests you. The seal knows the light of the trees. (the hidden name)
